reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, feminine, and comfortable, noting it's not itchy at all. The quality exceeds expectations, with one customer mentioning it's perfect for backyard parties, and they appreciate its flattering V-neck design and soft sage mint color. The length receives mixed feedback - while some find it great, others say it runs a little long. The sizing is also mixed, with some finding it true to size while others report it runs big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and Beautiful Dress!
items.body: The MEROKEETY womenâ€™s V-neck floral lace dress is gorgeous! The lace detail is delicate and classy, and the V-neck design is flattering. The short sleeves make it perfect for weddings, bridesmaids, or cocktail parties. The fit is true to size, and the fabric feels comfortable and high-quality. I received many compliments wearing itâ€”highly recommend for any special occasion! Read more
items.author: Michael

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: My fiancÃ© and I are flying to Las Vegas for a wedding. Weâ€™re all friends with the groom and the bride isnâ€™t bringing any friends or family (theyâ€™re Australian and eloping to be with the groomâ€™s American friends) so the other woman going and I wanted to wear the brideâ€™s colors for support. It seemed sad that the groom is going to have multiple groomsmen and the bride would have nobody. The bride doesnâ€™t know weâ€™re wearing red so we can coordinate with her (sheâ€™s painting her nails red -seriously, thatâ€™s all she said ). Itâ€™s just a fun surprise. So, us â€œbridesmaids â€œ had one rule-find something red that worked for a Vegas wedding. The other bridesmaid is wearing a red jumpsuit. I chose this, hoping it would look casual enough to wear around Vegas, but nice enough for a wedding. Yaâ€™ll, itâ€™s PERFECT. Love the red. Fits like an absolute dream on my 5â€™5â€ hourglass figure, 177-180 pounds, thick arms and hips, big booty and 36DDD top. It looks classy and can be dressed up (like for a wedding) or down for an everyday maxi dress. The only complaint is the lace in the chest area -Iâ€™ll have to wear something underneath for some modesty. A slip would work great. I really love the vibrancy of the red. And this is the first dress with a back zipper I have ever been able to zip up myself. It is sooo pretty and soooo comfortable. Length was perfect for me, floor length, with no shoes so will be fine with flat sandals, though I could get away with a heal with no problem as well. Highly recommend!!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and true to size
items.body: Really pretty and perfect for the costume I was creating. I'll be able to wear it for many occasions. True to size fit. I'm a large and the large was perfect. (I did order an XL first as most clothing items seem to run small, but it was too big and unflattering). Read more
items.author: My Tale

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering on fuller figures
items.body: Wore this for my wedding. I'm not as thin as I used to be, but this dress looked fantastic on. The sleeve length is perfect, the waist is comfortable, and the v-neck hit in just the right place. Got lots of compliments on this, and the price was great. I will say that the lace feels a little fragile, but that is truly my only complaint - and probably common with lace materials. Read more
items.author: JMCW

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful! Even For Heavier Women!
items.body: I'm always hesitant to buy clothes online, but I needed something quick, so I took a shot. I was part of a wedding and needed a blue dress, I looked all over and couldn't find one that fit the bride's specifications. With the wedding only weeks away, I found this beauty online and ordered it (based on other good reviews). It fit like a glove and is super comfortable. I struggle finding clothes that fit me well because I am heavy, but this dress was amazing and was very flattering. Like other reviews have mentioned, the bodice lining has little wholes which are see through (pictured), but this was easily resolved by wearing a slip with the dress. The sleeves are sheer, which made the dress very cool, which was nice because the wedding was outdoors on a hot day. The fabric is light, and the lace is very soft, again, perfect for warm days outside. I'm 5'5 and about 250lbs with a pronounced tummy, and I thought it looked great on me and I received a lot of compliments on the dress. I bought the light blue, and the color was as pictured and exactly what I needed. Read more
items.author: BJ Jensen

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress, butâ€¦â€¦..
items.body: This dress is so lovely. I found the fit to be true to size. I am large busted. The waist falls right under my bust line, like an empire waistline. There is a see through, decorative seam in between the bust line and at the waist. I would need to wear nude undergarments underneath. I didnâ€™t like this feature. I love the dress, itâ€™s just not flattering on me at all. Read more
items.author: Honey Bees

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, an elegant dress for XL sizes!
items.body: My mom has been searching for an elegant wedding guest dress for so long, but the American market is so unforgiving with XL body types. Everything we found was either too tight, too low-cut, or just not elegant enough. After endless Amazon orders and returns, she finally found this one and it feels like such a win. The neckline is modest, the fit is graceful, the material is just as beautiful as the pictures, and the color is absolutely stunning. Most importantly, she feels confident and elegant in it, without it looking oversized or unflattering. Seeing her so happy in this dress made the whole search worth it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, good quality
items.body: Beautiful color and beautiful style, just wish the neck line was a bit lower. But definitely a keeper for many occasions Read more
items.author: Denidia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Short Sleeve V Neck Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Short Sleeve V Neck Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Mint, Apricot, Black, Gray Blue, Dark Green, Light Blue, Royal, Dark Cyan, Navy, Plum, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
